Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Oct 2018It depends on the type of reward that he wants, whether is it cash rebates or miles. You can make use of online comparison sites such as MoneySmart and BankBazzar to compare which card suits him in terms of rewards, amount/percentage of cashback, minimum spending (if any) etc. Usually you'll be able to get some sign up gifts or deals such as getting cash credit for spending a certain amount within the first few months of your card approval. 0 comments0
